@anc13nts wrote:

HERE IS A SHOP CODE I MADE CUSTOM MADE 
100% TO ANC13NTS
FORUMS = WWW.ANC13NTSANDCARLOSX55.TK

POST FEEDBACK OR I DELETE PLEASE J

HERE IS A CUSTOM MADE SHOP CODE

[code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

        [Add in shops.cfg]

30 ancientscape_pking_shop 1 1 10677 100000 10364 1000000 8689 5000 11249 5000 11248 5000 11247 5000 13601 100000 15347 100000 15346 100000 9119 5000 11334 30000 10323 100000 9607 100000 11839 100000 15336 30000000 15335 30000000 15334 30000000 15333 30000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 ancient_pking[/code]

THIS IS ONE THAT U CAN PUT IN UR FORUMS OR SOMETHING

public void like to donate?()//Start Of like to donate? { sendQuest("@dre@donate using paypal", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("this would help alot to update forums alot better", 8147); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

HERES A GOLD P HAT CODE I MADE
if(i == 6900){ //Gold phat class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anInt174 = 2635; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Gold Party Hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Gold Party Hat.".getBytes(); }

{
sendQuest("@dre@donate using paypal", 8144);

flushOutStream();

[/code]

HERE IS A DULL GREEN PARTY HAT I MADE
If(i == 6991){ //~dull green party hat~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 999999; class8.anInt174 = 2635;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Dull Green Party Hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A dulled down Green Party Hat".getBytes(); }
REMEMBER ADD IN UR CLASS8.JAVA FILE
THEN USE ::PICKUP(ID)(#) TO GET THE ITEM

WELL ILL BE BAK LATER ADDIN SOME OTHER WEIRD COMMANDS LOL J BYE BYE

SINCERELY - ~ANC13NTS~
